mapper.select: select b.contents, b.title, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as reg_date, b.category_id, b.id, a.blog_id from category a join post b on a.id = b.category_id where a.blog_id = #{id} and b.category_id = #{categoryId} order by b.reg_date DESC limit 5

select b.contents, b.title, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as reg_date, b.category_id, b.id, a.blog_id from category a join post b on a.id = b.category_id where a.blog_id = #{id} and b.category_id = #{categoryId} and b.id = #{postId} order by b.reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into post (id, contents, reg_date, title, category_id) select null, #{contents}, now(), #{title}, category.id from category where category.name = #{categoryName}
